scripts.build: npm run build:login && npm run build:vue
scripts.build:login: cd front-end/login && npm install && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.build:vue: cd front-end/vue && npm install && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.rebuild: npm run rebuild:login && npm run rebuild:vue
scripts.rebuild:login: cd front-end/login && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.rebuild:vue: cd front-end/vue && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.prep:mssql-drop: sudo docker stop nectain-mssql && sudo docker rm nectain-mssql
scripts.init:createStore: npx ubcli createStore -cfg ubConfig-mssql-odbc.json -u admin -p admin
scripts.init:initDB: npx ubcli initDB -cfg ubConfig-mssql-odbc.json -drop -create -dba sa -dbaPwd P@ssw0rd -u admin -p admin
scripts.init:ddl: npx ubcli generateDDL -cfg ubConfig-mssql-odbc.json -u admin -p admin -autorun
scripts.init:data: npx ubcli initialize -cfg ubConfig-mssql-odbc.json -u admin -p admin
scripts.init: npm run init:createStore && npm run init:initDB && npm run init:ddl && npm run init:data
scripts.start: npm run start:ub && npm run start:ub-hmr
